Uses of Interface
org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.stream.HostLocator

    • Uses of HostLocator in org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.stream

      Classes in org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.stream that implement HostLocator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DiscoveryClientHostLocator
      An HostLocator that tries to find local service information from a DiscoveryClient.
      class  ServerPropertiesHostLocator
      A HostLocator that retrieves: service name - either from Span.getProcessId() or current application name address - from ServerProperties port - from lazily assigned port or ServerProperties
